verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
We exalt you
Just and true are all your ways
We exalt you
And glorify your name (repeat)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
For You are resplendent
In Your majesty
There is no other
god beside you
Magnificent in power and in glory
You are Jehovah God almighty

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Holy is the Lord of Hosts
Holy is the Lord - (repeat x2)
